attributes.action: abolish the whip system to allow votes of conscience for all MPs on all issues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The whip system is not understood, is accepted or ignored and yet is one of the biggest parliamentary tools undermining democracy in this country. Your MP plays to two masters, their constituents and the party whip. Once elected the party whip has the upper hand. We elect MP's to vote and represent our views in parliament. In order to do this MP's need to be free to vote according to the wishes, requirements and benefits of their constituents. Instead they vote in line with their party through the party whip system in order to protect their own and their parties position. Abolish the whip system and allow our MP's to represent us.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
